text: Wait, did Blake Shelton and Gwen Stefani tie the knot when no one was looking? The two are reportedly already husband and wife, having gotten married in a secret ceremony on his ranch! Surprise! In a year that has seen so many surprise engagements, it seems Blake Shelton, 42, and Gwen Stefani, 49, one - upped everyone by having a surprise wedding! The two got married in March, insiders tell Star magazine, and for the past six months, the two have kept their marriage a secret! The alleged wedding took place at Blake ’ s Tishomingo, Oklahoma ranch, at a “ small gazebo by the lake, ” where 45 friends and family members watched. “ It was super intimate.
